name: Gilded Devil
description: The Gilded Devil exhibits a shimmering, golden appearance, reflecting its nature as a manipulative fiend. It wields a unique Golden Flail, capable of inflicting both bludgeoning and fire damage.
memorable: Its ability to curse those accepting gifts and its potent magical attacks make it a formidable foe.
goals: To manipulate and deceive others, often through offerings of jewelry, while asserting dominance through magical prowess.
relations: Often interacts with other fiends, particularly in schemes of greed and trickery.
environment: Typically found in locations associated with wealth and greed, such as opulent lairs or treasure hoards.
strengths: Highly skilled in deception and persuasion, with substantial fire damage capabilities and magical resistance.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to silvered weapons and reliant on its spells for effectiveness in combat.
attacks: Utilizes the Golden Flail for powerful melee attacks, and can hurl flames at distance, both enhanced by its magical abilities.
most_powerful_ability: Voracious Greed allows it to consume wealth to regain hit points, emphasizing its gluttonous nature.
senses: Possesses Devil's Sight, enabling it to see in magical darkness.
skills: Exceptional in Deception and Persuasion, making it a fearsome manipulator in social encounters.
additional_information: Has the ability to teleport up to 120 feet.
Can transform its weapon into gold jewelry and vice versa.
Immunity to fire and poison damage.
Can cast illusions and mind-influencing spells at will.
Curses victims who accept its gifts, rendering them weaker against its attacks.
spellcasting: Can cast a variety of spells, focusing on charm and manipulation, requiring Wisdom as the spellcasting ability.
test_queries: fiend that uses greed and jewelry
devil with magical abilities and fire attacks
gilded creature that curses with gifts
manipulative fiend with a golden weapon
